title: US Treasury secretary and other finance ministers walk out of G20 meeting with Russia - CNN
content:
1. US Treasury secretary and other finance ministers walk out of G20 meeting with Russia  CNN
  2. Janet Yellen and other finance ministers walk out of G20 meeting as Russia speaks  NPR
  3. US Leads G20 Walkout of Russian Finance Officials  The Moscow Times
  4. G20 finance officials walk out in protest of Russian attendance  DW (English)
  5. Yellen and Ukraineâ€™s finance minister lead walkout as Russian delegate speaks at G-20 meeting  MarketWatch
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Finance ministers from multiple nations walked out of a closed-door G20 session in Washington on Wednesday when the Russian delegate began his prepared remarks, a show of protest against Moscow for its invasion of Ukraine.
